blogPosts.title: Building Serverless REST APIs in AWS using Typescript KoaJS and the Serverless Framework
blogPosts.summary: This post is about the serverless architecture and how I used it to build serverless APIs with KoaJs and the Serverless Framework using AWS. It also introduces a Serverless Framework Typescript template that can be used to easily spin up a new KoaJS application running on AWS using AWS Lambda and exposed via the Amazon API Gateway.
